messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] week four/needing support
messages.msgSnippet: Thank you Ren. Kristen ... From: starsuncloud@cs.com To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com Sent: Tuesday, January 28, 2003 7:27 PM Subject:
messages.messageBody:
Thank you Ren.

Kristen
----- Original Message -----
From: starsuncloud@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, January 28, 2003 7:27 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] week four/needing support


In a message dated 1/28/03 4:20:43 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< > I doubt very much the colleges ask 34 year old mothers applying to
college
> for the first time for SAT scores.
>

Maybe the person doesnt want to wait til they're 34 just to avoid SATs >>

The point wasn't to avoid anything.
The point was that there is obviously a lot of fear bound up in how hard it
is to get into college when it's not necessary or productive.
Sheesh.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson
Burnett
